doc.title: Colours of Blood
doc.plot: 'Colours of Blood' offers a poetic glimpse in the unknown world of true vampires and other blood loving creatures. Horror magician Dr Gore performs the art of splatter on stage to tackle his fear of blood. His part-time lover Naz plays with needles to turn him on. Tammy used to wear a razor sharp penknife on a velvet ribbon around her neck. She still has scars from erotic bloodletting games with her ex-boyfriend. Isis works in a hospital. Paradoxically, she's also the bisexual queen of London's true vampires. She mentors the newcomers, trains them to drink blood and checks out the donors, the 'blood-dolls'. For her, blood has only one meaning: lunch!
